data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kashani, Ghasem M., Malekhosseini, Mohammad-Javad, Sadeghi, Saber (2013): First recorded cave-dwelling terrestrial isopods (Isopoda: Oniscidea) in Iran with a description of a new species. Zootaxa 3734 (5): 591-596, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3734.5.8
